newsitem.title: USA: C.H. Heist calls off spinoff of Ablest.
newsitem.headline: C.H. Heist calls off spinoff of Ablest.

text.p: C.H. Heist Corp said Tuesday it called off the spinoff of Ablest Service Corp, its temporary staffing subsidiary.
The company said potential taxation of the distribution if an initial pubic offering could not be completed was instrumental in calling off the spinoff.

C.H. Heist also said that by keeping the companies together, it can better use the financial strength and leverage of the combined entities to "aggressively pursue" acquisitions and open new offices in strategic markets.
C.H. Heist Corp has two major lines of business, temporary staffing and industrial maintenance.
